name: AND
description: Evaluates to true if all boolean operands are true.

controls.name: operands
controls.description: A list of boolean operands, separated by commas.

examples.description: Returns true if operand1, operand1, and operand1 are all true.

name: OR
description: Evaluates to true if at least one boolean operand is true.

controls.name: operands
controls.description: A list of boolean operand, separated by commas.

examples.description: Returns true if at least one of operand1, operand1, or operand1 is true.
Returns true if operand is false.

name: EQ
description: Checks if two operands are equal.

examples.description: Returns true if operand1 is equal to operand2.

name: NE
description: Checks if two expressions are not equal.

examples.description: Returns true if operand1 is not equal to operand2.

name: TO_BOOLEAN_LIST
description: Converts a collection of elements to Boolean values.

controls.name: sourceType
controls.description: The data type of the source elements.

controls.name: valueTrue
controls.description: The value to map to true.

controls.name: valueFalse
controls.description: The value to map to false.

examples.description: Creates a Boolean list by mapping elements to true or false.

name: TO_BOOLEAN_SET
description: Converts a collection of elements to a Boolean set.

controls.name: sourceType
controls.description: The data type of the source elements.

controls.name: valueTrue
controls.description: The value to map to true.

controls.name: valueFalse
controls.description: The value to map to false.

examples.description: Creates a Boolean set by mapping elements to true or false.
